{"text":"We are helping driving industry to move forward."}

{"saying":"We believe that as a team, if our expertise and experience can save a single life, then we are doing a great job. It is our core responsibility to ensure safe driving practices on the road, which leads to saving time, lives and money.

\nKeep Calm and Drive Safely","image":"/files/doctor-782x800.png","name":"HE. Dr. Zakarya A K hejres","post":"Chairman"}

{"text":"As experts in human factors and psychometric testing, we aim to utilize all the efforts and knowledge we have accumulated to upgrade the profession of driving, reduce motor risks and prevent unforeseen and loss-mounting costs in all sectors.Taking up this issue is our social responsibility, we are confident at delivering results with a track record, that will not only catalyze a positive change in road safety but also lead organizations and corporations to consider drivers as one of their most valuable assets and have a core focus on their well-being."}

{"order_image":"order-2","order_text":"order-1","image":"/files/about.jpg","pill_color":"success","pill_heading":"Ethics","main_heading":"Corporate Ethics","sub_heading":"What it takes to provide best in class services.","show_points":1,"points":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","p_head":"MISSION","p_subhead":"To be the first organizational choice in the region for drivers integrated management systems."},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","p_head":"VISION","p_subhead":"Providing world-class drivers management systems which identifies, evaluates and mitigate risks, and reduce costs."},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","p_head":"VALUES","p_subhead":"Customer focused result and cost oriented, Innovated, and customized solutions whilst ensuring Safety always comes first."}]}

{"text":"Professional driving requires a level of skill and Character. The challenges of undertaking multiple tasks in stipulated timings in a competitive environment force these drivers to take various risk. A violation could cause them physical & financial losses. Long working hours exposes them to various occupational sickness. Which in turn could affect their visual, attitude steadiness co-ordination and character."}

{"order_image":"order-1","order_text":"order-2","image":"/files/test.svg","pill_color":"primary","pill_heading":"Tests","main_heading":"Specialized Tests","sub_heading":"We have developed tests & training to measure and improve the required skill and character of a driver.","show_points":1,"points":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","p_head":"Depth Visualization"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","p_head":"Visual Attention"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","p_head":"Hand Eye Coordination"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","p_head":"Simple & Complex details"},{"idx":5,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 5","p_head":"Character Test"}]}

{"text":"Roadslink with its in-depth research on Traffic Psychology and Road Safety have developed tests & training to measure and improve the required skill and character of a driver. This test’s & training would help companies recruit drivers with good skills, and identify training requirements in their workforce."}

{"accord_name":"Psycho","items":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","heading":"VISUAL ATTENTION","categories":"Drivers, Instructors/Trainers, Front Desk/Clarks, Call center, Technical management, Mid Management, Senior Management","ratings":"2,5,2,2,5,3.5,5","header":"Designations, Requirements","details":"Drivers:2, Instructors/Trainers:5, Front Desk/Clarks:2, Call center:2, Technical management:5, Mid Management:3.5, Senior Management:5\n","headers":"Designations,Necessity"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","heading":"DEPTH VISUALIZATION","headers":"Designations,Necessity","details":"Drivers:2, Instructors/Trainers:5, Front Desk/Clarks:2, Call center:2, Technical management:5, Mid Management:3.5, Senior Management:5"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","details":"Drivers:2, Instructors/Trainers:5, Front Desk/Clarks:2, Call center:2, Technical management:5, Mid Management:3.5, Senior Management:5","headers":"Designations,Necessity","heading":"SIMPLE & COMPLEX RECOGNITIONS"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","details":"Drivers:2, Instructors/Trainers:5, Front Desk/Clarks:2, Call center:2, Technical management:5, Mid Management:3.5, Senior Management:5","headers":"Designations,Necessity","heading":"EYE & HAND CO-ORDINATION"},{"idx":5,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 5","details":"Drivers:2, Instructors/Trainers:5, Front Desk/Clarks:2, Call center:2, Technical management:5, Mid Management:3.5, Senior Management:5","heading":"STEADINESS","headers":"Designations,Necessity"},{"idx":6,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 6","details":"Drivers:2, Instructors/Trainers:5, Front Desk/Clarks:2, Call center:2, Technical management:5, Mid Management:3.5, Senior Management:5","headers":"Designations,Necessity","heading":"CHARACTER TEST"}]}

{"text":"DRMS is a complete tailor-made management practice and cost prevention technique that studies the human factor, i.e. the professional drivers of any organization or co-operation, frameworks programs and procedures to reduce the risk created by and around them, and thus results in a variety of social, economic and strategic benefits to the entity."}

{"steps":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","heading":"DRIVER PERSONAL SELECTION / ASSESSMENT (DPSA)","text":"Recruitment is considered to be the most important aspect of Driver Risk Management. Our experience in this domain defines the ideal driver wherein the Physical, Behavioral, Knowledge & Skill level, Attitude will be listed in detail.","image":"/files/dpsa.jpg"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","heading":"DRIVER KPI MONITORING (DKPIM)","text":"While defining a job with key results area can be a great foundation for Risk Management, monitoring the driving throughout the job hours ensures that the driver is adhering to the defined job description.","image":"/files/kpi.jpg"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","heading":"ANNUAL DRIVER APPRAISAL AND EVALUATION (ADAE)","text":"Appraisal systems exist to improve organizational efficiency by ensuring that individuals perform to the best of their ability, develop their potential, and earn appropriate reward.","image":"/files/appraisal.jpg"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","heading":"DRIVER COMPENSATION & BENEFITS (DCB)","text":"Though money is not the biggest motivator, when an employee is compensated proportionate to the efforts, they are most likely to become highly loyal to the employer. This fosters a positive work culture and thus, a highly productive output from employees.","image":"/files/award.jpg"},{"idx":5,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 5","heading":"DRIVER RECOGNITION & REWARD (DRR)","text":"Successful organizations use R&R effectively. Employee achievements and/or performance improvement is a vital part of performance management. A sincere and honest approach in reward system lets employees know that you appreciate their efforts. This simple act takes little time but will provide many benefits. ","image":"/files/reward.jpg"},{"idx":6,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 6","heading":"LEARNING, TRAINING AND DEVELOPMENT (LTD)","text":"Though many organizations offer training to the employees, many times it does not follow a learning path. A training which has not assessed the learner’s need for training may not be effective. We at Roadslink start the learning & development right from profiling the drivers while they are hired. ","image":"/files/training.jpg"},{"idx":7,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 7","heading":"ENTERPRISE WIDE RISK MEASUREMENT (ERM)","text":"In a business that is exposed to continuous and severe risks that may also involve a third party, it is highly important to have a Risk Assessment and Measurement system. A system to identify all potential hazards, chances of risk occurrence and consequences of reoccurrence, etc. ","image":"/files/erm.jpg"},{"idx":8,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 8","heading":"COMPANY-LEVEL MANAGEMENT INFORMATION SYSTEM (CMIS)","text":"Business reports are an integral part of actively managing any company. Management uses the reports to track progress towards its various goals, control expenditures and increase revenue.","image":"/files/management.jpg"}]}

{"text":"Our Drivers English Program is a researched based program accredited by Emirates College for Management & Information Technology. It is an online based program that focuses on 13 scenarios and terminology that a driver life revolves around. Example Local Culture, A Day as a Taxi Driver, My Car, Airport Trip, Shopping Trip, Directions, Weather, My Ethics and Moral etc."}

{"order_image":"order-1","order_text":"order-2","image":"/files/englishside.svg","pill_color":"primary","pill_heading":"Assurances","main_heading":"DRIVER'S ASSURANCE","sub_heading":"The comprehensive Assessments and training assures the drivers:","show_points":1,"points":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","p_head":"Develop better communication skills","p_subhead":""},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","p_head":"Gain more knowledge on their social responsibility and local culture"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","p_head":"Build better customer service skills"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","p_head":"Advance better understanding of the environment surrounding them"},{"idx":5,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 5","p_head":"FREE Glossary and Dictionary"},{"idx":6,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 6","p_head":"FREE ENGLISH TRAINING"}]}

{"text":"The training and assessments are designed in an innovative and creative way that assures putting the trainee driver in a situation close to the live situation. This is done with the assistant of various visuals and audio which are translated in multiple languages like Urdu, Arabic, Hindi and Malayalam. So that drivers can take the benefits from the course.\n"}

{"text":"Management training courses are training activities that focus on improving an individual's skills as a leader and manager in the transportation industry and traffic sector. Please find a list of the courses we offer below. For more information please contact us."}

{"order_image":"order-1","order_text":"order-2","image":"/files/fleet.svg","pill_color":"primary","pill_heading":"Driving","main_heading":"Driving Technologies","sub_heading":"The comprehensive management courses to cater various needs","show_points":1,"points":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","p_head":"Change Managements","p_subhead":""},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","p_head":"Fleet Managements"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","p_head":"Defensive Driving Introductions and Safety Driving Techniques"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","p_head":"Eco Driving Methodology"},{"idx":5,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 5","p_head":"Motorcycle Driving"}]}

{"order_image":"order-2","order_text":"order-1","image":"/files/train.svg","pill_color":"primary","pill_heading":"Managemet","main_heading":"Management Courses","sub_heading":"The comprehensive management courses to cater various Management needs","show_points":1,"points":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","p_head":"Leadership and management skills","p_subhead":""},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","p_head":"Strategy Management"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","p_head":"Customer service"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","p_head":"Marketing"},{"idx":5,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 5","p_head":"Train the Driving Trainers"},{"idx":6,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 6","p_head":"Human Resource and Driver Selections"},{"idx":7,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 7","p_head":"Quality and Implementation of ISO 9001:2015"}]}

{"text":"Our experienced consultants have developed a comprehensive and dedicated ‘Traffic Education System’ that takes into account methodologies, processes and procedures that are integral to the transportation and traffic industry, in order to achieve Road Safety goals seamlessly. Our consultants are knowledgeable and skilled on all aspects of the subject and can develop tailor-made lessons and lectures to suit project sizes or target groups."}

{"heading":"Training Aids","sub_heading":"Driving trainees in many cases need to be trained on how to deal with several kinds of harsh conditions. Using training aids, driving trainees can be well prepared to any harsh condition...","primary_text":"Contact Us","primary_action":"/contact","image":"/files/training.png","border":1}

{"text":"Driving trainees in many cases need to be trained on how to deal with several kinds of harsh conditions. Using training aids, driving trainees can be well prepared to any harsh condition. Some of the training aids are collision sledges, head restraints, turnover cars and simulators for both light and heavy vehicles. Where both the hardware and software scenarios can be provided. Roads Link, using its international network, assesses its clients in choosing and implementing the most suitable training aids with international and up to date standards."}
{"heading":"Aids","pill_color":"primary","title":"Training Aids","sub_title":"Training aids with international and up to date standards."}

{"steps":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","heading":"Head Restraints","text":"An automotive safety feature to prevent or mitigate whiplash or injury to the cervical vertebrae.Since their inception head restraints have prevented or mitigated thousands of serious injuries.","image":"/files/Headrest.jpg"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","heading":"Collision Sledges","text":"Sled test systems have been used by the automotive and aerospace industries for decades as a tool for developing safety systems. Sled testing allows engineers to reproduce the dynamic conditions of a full-scale crash event in a controlled environment and at a fraction of the cost of a crash test. ","image":"/files/collision.jpg"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","heading":"Simulators","text":"Driving simulators place the driver in an artificial environment believed to be a valid substitute for one or more aspects of the actual driving experience. However, unlike flight simulators developed mainly for pilot training, driving simulators support much more than driver training","image":"/files/simulator.jpg"}]}

{"text":"Train the trainer, sometimes referred to as TTT, is an education model whereby we identified to teach, mentor or train others carrying out training themselves. Some may already be educators or trainers and are supplementing or reinforcing their skills, while others are receiving training for the first time. Ensure your trainer and the instructor has the correct knowledge to teach staff, our train the trainer program is designed to fulfill your vision and assist instructors with the correct knowledge needed to be a certified trainer."}
